pages.title: God Speed Love
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kabuto: God Speed Love (2006, movie)$(br2)Spawn locations: Nether$(br2)Includes $(l:kabuto/mobs/zectrooper)ZECTrooper$(/l), $(l:kabuto/mobs/shadow_trooper)Shadow Trooper$(/l), and $(l:kabuto/mobs/neotrooper)Neotrooper$(/l) trial spawners$(br2)Trial loot:$(li)1 $(l:kabuto/items/zecters#lady_zecter)Lady Zecter$(/l) (28.6%)$(li)1 $(l:misc/blocks/decor_blocks#blue_rose)Blue Rose$(/l) (28.6%)
